verses.name: John 21:14
verses.text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples, after that he was risen from the dead.

verses.name: John 21:15
verses.text: So when they had dined, Jesus saith to Simon Peter, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me more than these? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my lambs.

verses.name: John 21:16
verses.text: He saith to him again the second time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
